Package com.prodp.apsim

Interface Summary
APConnectionUsable Interface for classes that control the networking systems of APSim.
 

Class Summary
APArrayUtils This class contains many important array utilities and methods that are necessary for processing (game internals).
APBlurLabel This class is a customization of the JLabel; it adds the necessary "fancy" addends to the text, including the gradient and (before) the blur.
APButton This class is a customization of the APButton; it contains many graphics tricks to make it look professional.
APClient Represents the client-side part of a multiplayer game.
APClientProcess Identity class for telling APSim that the user is playing a multiplayer game.
APClientWatcher This class is supposed to control client processes while the client input is blocking (associated with the input stream on the network).
APCloseButton Since JTabbedPane does not have close buttons, this is an implementation of them, a custom component.
APFileFilter This class is used with JFileChooser.
APFinalData Contains all of the constants in APSim as well as some miscellaneous members.
APFPSUpdater Automatically updates the FPS counter in the top right hand corner of the GUI.
APGlassPane To be possibly used for painting directly onto the Canvas3D without worrying about adding scene objects.
APGUI This initiates and creates every GUI element used in the game, including the main JFrame and the title screen.
APHasher This class is supposed to hash the whole runtime jar to see if it is different than the website's MD5 hash.
APIconComponent Icon for the tabs on the JTabbedPane.
APMain Main starting point for APSim.
APMaterialsList Contains many utility methods for finding specific APMaterials from their attributes.
APObject Root class of some APSim classes.
APOBJFilter This class is used with JFileChooser.
APOBJWriter Writes the coordinate data in the APSim cubes to a .OBJ/.MTL file for external rendering.
APPair A specialized Pair, between two APMaterials.
APProcess Container for APSim game data.
APProcessableItem Base class for classes that read and write from a file.
APProcessHandler Main controller for all APSim processes.
APProcessList List of all the processes (games) in progress.
APRandImage Generates a random image; the image consists of white dots plotted randomly over a black background.
APReaction A reaction between two elements is defined as an element a changing to an element c due to contact with element b.
APReactionList Keeps reactions in a list, and allows for quick retrieving and reading.
APRenderer A cover for the canvas; allows more functions.
APSceneGraph The 3D scene; includes utility functions to make scene preparation easier.
APServer The server of APSim; includes all necessary processes for updating the server.
APServerProcess Identity class; distinguishes servers away from other processes.
APServerThread The thread that updates the server.
APServerThreadWatcher Updates the log of the server every once in a while.
APSky The sky sphere of the world, being a starfield imposed onto a sphere.
APVelocity  
APVideoRecorder 3D object/model video recorder, takes a snapshot of the scene, transforms it into obj format, and saves it every ms.
APWorld The APSim world containing functions for writing the APSim world data.
Flagger Allows the programmer to set certain parts of a boolean array on or off; this is a cover for a boolean primitive array.
Transform3DUtils  
 

Enum Summary
APMaterial Materials for APSim.
